sentences.en: " Who were you driving with on Washington Boulevard?
sentences.cn: “ 你在华盛顿大道和谁一起坐马车兜风?

sentences.en: Automobiles speed in an endless stream along the boulevard.
sentences.cn: 宽阔的林荫道上,汽车川流不息.

sentences.en: Crown Regency Hotel & Towers in Osmena Boulevard , Cebu.
For our clothes, we went to a shop on Hollywood Boulevard, and we just picked it all off the rack.
sentences.cn: 至于衣服，我们到好莱坞大道上的一家商店里，都是直接挑现成的买。

sentences.en: How long is Jones Boulevard Street?
I went north on Union Boulevard to Elm Street.
sentences.cn: 我从联合大道向北到爱尔姆街.

sentences.en: Make a left at Crenshaw Boulevard and you'll see a bank on your right.
sentences.cn: 在克林萧大道左转,你会看见一家银行在你的右手边.

sentences.en: Phillips Park was bordered by Pelee Boulevard and Elmhurst.
sentences.cn: 菲力浦公园的两边是比利大道及艾尔姆霍斯特大街.

sentences.en: Sunset Boulevard was originally conceived by Wilder as an astringent satire on Hollywood.
sentences.cn: 怀尔德最初是想把《日落大道》拍成一部对好莱坞的辛辣讽刺片。

sentences.en: The Boulevard at that time was little more than a country road.
sentences.cn: 那条林荫大道当时和一条乡村大路差不多.

sentences.en: The Boulevard was busy with trains and people going to work.
sentences.cn: 来往电车和上班的人流使大街热闹非常.

sentences.en: The old town centre is girdled by a boulevard lined with trees.
sentences.cn: 一条林阴大道环绕古城的中心。

sentences.en: There is heavy traffic on Parashall Boulevard.
sentences.cn: 帕雷尔大道上有很大的交通量.

sentences.en: They replaced the narrow streets with wide boulevard.
sentences.cn: 他们将狭窄的街道都改建成了宽阔的林荫大道.

sentences.en: We did an extremely fast U-turn and shot south up the Boulevard St. Michel.
sentences.cn: 我们飞快地来了个180度的转弯，然后沿着圣米歇尔大道向南疾驰而去。

trans.tran_en: a wide road in a town or city, often with trees along the sides

trans.tran_cn: 给…提供林阴大街；把…建成林阴大街
